page.title: 04Law & Order and Lifestyles
page.content:
Law and Order
Policemen are rarely seen in the area, and if they do appear it is usually to check on a firearms or gun licence. The open landscape makes strangers immediately visible, and the inhabitants know their neighbours well enough to recognise intruders.
Lifestyles
People living here do so for their livelihood or for the solitude. There is no community life to speak of, and the population is independently minded but neighbourly. People living in the fen area, whilst often related to adjacent village community, are regarded almost as outsiders - "the people in the fen".
